    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60105)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ESP32_DEV)
    add_definitions(-DBOARD_HAS_PSRAM)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=0)
    add_definitions(-DESP32_4M)
    add_definitions(-DCORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0)
    add_definitions(-DTASMOTA)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_CONFIG_OVERRIDE)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_IPV6)
    add_definitions(-DBUFFER_LENGTH=128)
    add_definitions(-DHTTP_UPLOAD_BUFLEN=2048)
    add_definitions(-DMQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1200)
    add_definitions(-Duint32=uint32_t)
    add_definitions(-Duint16=uint16_t)
    add_definitions(-Duint8=uint8_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint8_t=int8_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint32_t=int32_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint16_t=int16_t)
    add_definitions(-Dmemcpy_P=memcpy)
    add_definitions(-Dmemcmp_P=memcmp)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_4K_RSA)
    add_definitions(-DMY_LANGUAGE=sk_SK)
    add_definitions(-DFIRMWARE_TASMOTA32)
    add_definitions(-DHAVE_CONFIG_H)
    add_definitions(-DMBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\")
    add_definitions(-DUNITY_INCLUDE_CONFIG_H)
    add_definitions(-DWITH_POSIX)
    add_definitions(-D_GNU_SOURCE)
    add_definitions(-DIDF_VER=\"v4.3-dev-8738-ga0113c7bfe\")
    add_definitions(-DESP_PLATFORM)
    add_definitions(-DNDEBUG)
    add_definitions(-D_POSIX_READER_WRITER_LOCKS)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32)
    add_definitions(-DESP32)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=160000000L)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10812)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_VARIANT=\"esp32\")
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_BOARD=\"Espressif\ Generic\ ESP32\ >=\ 4M\ Flash\ PSRAM,\ Tasmota\ 2880k\ Code/OTA,\ 320k\ FS\")
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_PARTITION_esp32_partition_app2880k_fs320k)

    add_definitions(-DBOARD_HAS_PSRAM)

    add_definitions(-DTASMOTA)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "tasmota-sensors")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60105)
    add_definitions(-DESP8266)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_ESP8266)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ESP8266_ESP01)
    add_definitions(-DESP8266_1M)

    add_definitions(-DTASMOTA)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_CONFIG_OVERRIDE)
    add_definitions(-DNDEBUG)
    add_definitions(-DFP_IN_IROM)
    add_definitions(-DBEARSSL_SSL_BASIC)
    add_definitions(-DPIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_ESPRESSIF_SDK22x_190703)
    add_definitions(-DPIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_LWIP2_HIGHER_BANDWIDTH_LOW_FLASH)
    add_definitions(-DVTABLES_IN_FLASH)
    add_definitions(-DPSTR_ALIGN=1)
    add_definitions(-DMIMETYPE_MINIMAL)
    add_definitions(-DWAVEFORM_LOCKED_PWM)
    add_definitions(-DFIRMWARE_SENSORS)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=80000000L)
    add_definitions(-D__ets__)
    add_definitions(-DICACHE_FLASH)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10805)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_BOARD=\"PLATFORMIO_ESP8266_1M\")
    add_definitions(-DFLASHMODE_DOUT)
    add_definitions(-DLWIP_OPEN_SRC)
    add_definitions(-DNONOSDK22x_190703=1)
    add_definitions(-DTCP_MSS=1460)
    add_definitions(-DLWIP_FEATURES=0)
    add_definitions(-DLWIP_IPV6=0)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "tasmota32-odroidgo")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60105)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ESP32_DEV)
    add_definitions(-DBOARD_HAS_PSRAM)
    add_definitions(-DHAS_PSRAM_FIX)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=0)
    add_definitions(-DESP32_4M)
    add_definitions(-DCORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0)
    add_definitions(-DTASMOTA)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_CONFIG_OVERRIDE)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_IPV6)
    add_definitions(-DBUFFER_LENGTH=128)
    add_definitions(-DHTTP_UPLOAD_BUFLEN=2048)
    add_definitions(-DMQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1200)
    add_definitions(-Duint32=uint32_t)
    add_definitions(-Duint16=uint16_t)
    add_definitions(-Duint8=uint8_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint8_t=int8_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint32_t=int32_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint16_t=int16_t)
    add_definitions(-Dmemcpy_P=memcpy)
    add_definitions(-Dmemcmp_P=memcmp)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_4K_RSA)
    add_definitions(-DFIRMWARE_TASMOTA32)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ODROID_ESP32)
    add_definitions(-DHAVE_CONFIG_H)
    add_definitions(-DMBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\")
    add_definitions(-DUNITY_INCLUDE_CONFIG_H)
    add_definitions(-DWITH_POSIX)
    add_definitions(-D_GNU_SOURCE)
    add_definitions(-DIDF_VER=\"v4.3-dev-8738-ga0113c7bfe\")
    add_definitions(-DESP_PLATFORM)
    add_definitions(-DNDEBUG)
    add_definitions(-D_POSIX_READER_WRITER_LOCKS)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32)
    add_definitions(-DESP32)

    add_definitions(-DESP32_4M)
    add_definitions(-DCORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0)
    add_definitions(-DTASMOTA)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_CONFIG_OVERRIDE)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_IPV6)
    add_definitions(-DBUFFER_LENGTH=128)
    add_definitions(-DHTTP_UPLOAD_BUFLEN=2048)
    add_definitions(-DMQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1200)
    add_definitions(-Duint32=uint32_t)
    add_definitions(-Duint16=uint16_t)
    add_definitions(-Duint8=uint8_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint8_t=int8_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint32_t=int32_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint16_t=int16_t)

    add_definitions(-Dmemcmp_P=memcmp)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_4K_RSA)
    add_definitions(-DMY_LANGUAGE=tr_TR)
    add_definitions(-DFIRMWARE_TASMOTA32)
    add_definitions(-DHAVE_CONFIG_H)
    add_definitions(-DMBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\")
    add_definitions(-DUNITY_INCLUDE_CONFIG_H)
    add_definitions(-DWITH_POSIX)
    add_definitions(-D_GNU_SOURCE)
    add_definitions(-DIDF_VER=\"v4.3-dev-8738-ga0113c7bfe\")
    add_definitions(-DESP_PLATFORM)
    add_definitions(-DNDEBUG)
    add_definitions(-D_POSIX_READER_WRITER_LOCKS)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32)
    add_definitions(-DESP32)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=160000000L)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10812)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_VARIANT=\"esp32\")
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_BOARD=\"Espressif\ Generic\ ESP32\ >=\ 4M\ Flash\ PSRAM,\ Tasmota\ 2880k\ Code/OTA,\ 320k\ FS\")

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "tasmota-VN")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60105)
    add_definitions(-DESP8266)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_ESP8266)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ESP8266_ESP01)
    add_definitions(-DESP8266_1M)
    add_definitions(-DCORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0)
    add_definitions(-DTASMOTA)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_CONFIG_OVERRIDE)
    add_definitions(-DNDEBUG)
    add_definitions(-DFP_IN_IROM)
    add_definitions(-DBEARSSL_SSL_BASIC)
    add_definitions(-DPIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_ESPRESSIF_SDK22x_190703)
    add_definitions(-DPIO_FRAMEWORK_ARDUINO_LWIP2_HIGHER_BANDWIDTH_LOW_FLASH)
    add_definitions(-DVTABLES_IN_FLASH)
    add_definitions(-DPSTR_ALIGN=1)
    add_definitions(-DMIMETYPE_MINIMAL)
    add_definitions(-DWAVEFORM_LOCKED_PWM)
    add_definitions(-DMY_LANGUAGE=vi_VN)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=80000000L)
    add_definitions(-D__ets__)
    add_definitions(-DICACHE_FLASH)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10805)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_BOARD=\"PLATFORMIO_ESP8266_1M\")
    add_definitions(-DFLASHMODE_DOUT)
    add_definitions(-DLWIP_OPEN_SRC)
    add_definitions(-DNONOSDK22x_190703=1)
    add_definitions(-DTCP_MSS=1460)

    add_definitions(-DESP8266)

    add_definitions(-DMIMETYPE_MINIMAL)
    add_definitions(-DWAVEFORM_LOCKED_PWM)
    add_definitions(-DMY_LANGUAGE=sv_SE)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=80000000L)
    add_definitions(-D__ets__)
    add_definitions(-DICACHE_FLASH)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10805)

    add_definitions(-DFLASHMODE_DOUT)
    add_definitions(-DLWIP_OPEN_SRC)
    add_definitions(-DNONOSDK22x_190703=1)
    add_definitions(-DTCP_MSS=1460)
    add_definitions(-DLWIP_FEATURES=0)
    add_definitions(-DLWIP_IPV6=0)

    add_definitions(-DESP32_4M)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "tasmota32c3cdc")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60105)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_USB_MODE=1)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=0)
    add_definitions(-DESP32_4M)
    add_definitions(-DESP32C3)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_USB_CDC_CONSOLE)
    add_definitions(-DCORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0)
    add_definitions(-DTASMOTA)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_CONFIG_OVERRIDE)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_IPV6)
    add_definitions(-DBUFFER_LENGTH=128)
    add_definitions(-DHTTP_UPLOAD_BUFLEN=2048)
    add_definitions(-DMQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1200)
    add_definitions(-Duint32=uint32_t)
    add_definitions(-Duint16=uint16_t)
    add_definitions(-Duint8=uint8_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint8_t=int8_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint32_t=int32_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint16_t=int16_t)
    add_definitions(-Dmemcpy_P=memcpy)
    add_definitions(-Dmemcmp_P=memcmp)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_4K_RSA)
    add_definitions(-DFIRMWARE_TASMOTA32)
    add_definitions(-DHAVE_CONFIG_H)
    add_definitions(-DMBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\")
    add_definitions(-DUNITY_INCLUDE_CONFIG_H)
    add_definitions(-DWITH_POSIX)
    add_definitions(-D_GNU_SOURCE)
    add_definitions(-DIDF_VER=\"v4.3-dev-8738-ga0113c7bfe\")
    add_definitions(-DESP_PLATFORM)
    add_definitions(-DNDEBUG)
    add_definitions(-D_POSIX_READER_WRITER_LOCKS)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32)
    add_definitions(-DESP32)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=160000000L)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10812)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_VARIANT=\"esp32c3\")
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_BOARD=\"Espressif\ Generic\ ESP32-C3\ >=\ 4M\ Flash,\ Tasmota\ 2880k\ Code/OTA,\ 320k\ FS\")

    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_BOARD=\"Espressif\ Generic\ ESP32\ >=\ 4M\ Flash\ PSRAM,\ Tasmota\ 2880k\ Code/OTA,\ 320k\ FS\")

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "tasmota32")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60105)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ESP32_DEV)
    add_definitions(-DBOARD_HAS_PSRAM)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=0)
    add_definitions(-DESP32_4M)
    add_definitions(-DCORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=0)
    add_definitions(-DTASMOTA)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_CONFIG_OVERRIDE)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_IPV6)
    add_definitions(-DBUFFER_LENGTH=128)
    add_definitions(-DHTTP_UPLOAD_BUFLEN=2048)
    add_definitions(-DMQTT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE=1200)
    add_definitions(-Duint32=uint32_t)
    add_definitions(-Duint16=uint16_t)
    add_definitions(-Duint8=uint8_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint8_t=int8_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint32_t=int32_t)
    add_definitions(-Dsint16_t=int16_t)
    add_definitions(-Dmemcpy_P=memcpy)
    add_definitions(-Dmemcmp_P=memcmp)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_4K_RSA)
    add_definitions(-DFIRMWARE_TASMOTA32)
    add_definitions(-DHAVE_CONFIG_H)
    add_definitions(-DMBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE=\"mbedtls/esp_config.h\")
    add_definitions(-DUNITY_INCLUDE_CONFIG_H)
    add_definitions(-DWITH_POSIX)
    add_definitions(-D_GNU_SOURCE)
    add_definitions(-DIDF_VER=\"v4.3-dev-8738-ga0113c7bfe\")
    add_definitions(-DESP_PLATFORM)
    add_definitions(-DNDEBUG)
    add_definitions(-D_POSIX_READER_WRITER_LOCKS)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_ESP32)
    add_definitions(-DESP32)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=160000000L)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10812)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_VARIANT=\"esp32\")
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_BOARD=\"Espressif\ Generic\ ESP32\ >=\ 4M\ Flash\ PSRAM,\ Tasmota\ 2880k\ Code/OTA,\ 320k\ FS\")
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_PARTITION_esp32_partition_app2880k_fs320k)
